meaningMnemonic: If you tasted the air at a <kanji>recital</kanji> the <kanji>flavor</kanji> would taste like <vocabulary>scrutiny</vocabulary>. That's really what everyone is doing when they watch. They don't really want to hear you, they just want to judge you.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
